product_name: The North Face Storm Hiking Boots - Boys'
long_description: Lightweight and durable, the boys' Storm hiking boots from The North Face offer breathable, flexible coverage and comfortable support for days spent exploring the great outdoors. Split-suede uppers with breathable mesh offer flexible, weather-resistant coverage; gussetued tongues keep out trail debris. Injection-molded EVA midsoles provide all-day cushioning and support. The North Face Storm hiking boots for boys feature nonmarking, rugged rubber outsoles for excellent traction on wet or uneven surfaces.
short_description: Lightweight and durable, the boys' Storm hiking boots from The North Face offer breathable, flexible coverage and comfortable support for days spent exploring the great outdoors.
